alert.note: Alert for Raft River Region; Southern Hills, Albion Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 28 at 2:47AM MST until January 28 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 1 to 3 inches below 6000 feet MSL and 4 to 10 inches above 6000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph leading to areas of blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Sweetzer Summit, Connor Summit, and City of Rocks NR including the communities Albion, Almo, Elba, Malta, Rockland, and Holbrook. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or by visiting 511.idaho.gov.

area.areaDesc: Raft River Region; Southern Hills, Albion Mountains
